metadata.name: Distracted the enemy aircraft
metadata.description:
Ukrainian aviator who became the best fighter pilot in the world. More than two thousand flight hours, triumphant flights at the air show - SIAF, The Royal International Air Tattoo, International Airshow-2017, Czech International Air Fest. His handwriting and style of performance in aerobatics are now known to the whole world.
The pilot died in an air battle, heroically diverting enemy aircraft.
Seven Ukrainian pilots entered into an unequal battle with twenty cars of Russian and Belarusian vultures. The pilot was able to divert most of the enemy forces by aerobatics, which made it easier for the rest of the group but was shot down.
He was admired by aviators all over the world.
